actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to entitle Civil Air Patrol Cadets 18 years of age and older to compensation available to Civil Air Patrol senior members in the event of disability or death, and to increase the level of compensation available to both.

summary.text: Entitles Civil Air Patrol Cadets 18 years of age and older to compensation available to Civil Air Patrol senior members in the event of disability or death, and increases to a specified amount the level of such compensation to both classes of members.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to entitle Civil Air Patrol Cadets 18 years of age and older to compensation available to Civil Air Patrol senior members in the event of disability or death, and to increase the level of compensation available to both.
